question: Please interpret a dream of mine where I heard that someone had passed away?
answer:
QUESTION
Salaamz,I recently dreamt of a person dieing.I was so upset about this I called out the persons name,a females name(a friend of mine)in my dream and cried in my dream and asked ALLAH why did he take this person away.The person who gave me the news of the death did not communicate with me in the dream and the only thing I remember was the person being in black clothing.I was terified when I awoke.What was the meaning of that dream of mine?
ANSWER


Share:
A dream of death, etc. is a reminder of death.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
